HTML.ScaleFont:
Increase or decrease the font size of the selected element.
LMB: Increase font size.
RMB: Decrease font size.
HTML.Export:
Save character data for Foundry.
Contains only initial parameters, not saving changes in this sheet.
Version:

inputcolor.Name: Ð¡olor of character values
inputcolor.Hint: Enter the color code perceived by CSS ("white", "#FFFFFF", "rgba(255,255,255,0.5)"...).

embedimages.Name: Embed Images
embedimages.Hint:
Embed images for each actor item, such as talents, items, magic, etc.
Turn it off if it causes errors when exporting the sheet.

conection.Name: Server IP address
conection.Hint:
Required for embedding images. Use the format "http://IP:PORT/".
If you are the server host, use "http://localhost:PORT/".

defaultName.Name: Default File Name
defaultName.Hint: Leave empty to use the actor's name as the default file name.
